page.title: 20Acknowledgements:Deverills
page.content: {The Deverills area}was surveyed and written about for{The Domesday Project by: Justine Ambrose, Nicola Blake, Sally Coward, Terry Dye, Chad Edgecombe, Peter Ellison, Selina Epps, Steven Fear, Diana Gordon, Loma Harris, Philippa Higginson,Craig Hill, Laura King, Cheryl Knight, Stuart McNicol, Philip Oliver , Debbie Park, Luke Pierce, Andrew Pitman, David Purdue, Peter Rice, Samantha Rivers, Richard Simmonds and Matthew Tazewell , children of Class 1,{St John's Primary {School, Warminster. They were helped by their teacher Mrs C.M.Clayton and their Headmaster Mr R.H.Light.
